meanings.definition: A preparation intended to supplement a diet with vitamins, minerals, and other nutritional elements.
meanings.sent1: I take multivitamins every morning to make sure I get all the necessary nutrients.
meanings.sent2: My doctor recommended multivitamins to help me stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: When I accidentally dropped the bottle of multivitamins, they scattered like confetti.
meanings.sent4: To me, multivitamins are like a daily dose of sunshine for my body.
meanings.sent5: The colorful multivitamins looked like tiny jewels in the palm of my hand.

meanings.definition: A combination of different vitamins and minerals in a single dosage form.
meanings.sent1: The multivitamins I bought contain vitamin C, D, and calcium.
meanings.sent2: She prefers multivitamins that are easy to swallow.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the multivitamins for candy and almost ate them all.
meanings.sent4: The multivitamins work together like a team to keep me healthy.
meanings.sent5: Taking multivitamins is like giving my body a little boost every day.
